title: Video: Vincent Vocoder Voice – MeMeMeMeMeMeMeNow
body:
There is a wanton, [self-serving](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/22859-i-am-gonna-make-it-through-this-year-if-it-kills-me-our-picks-of-2k13/ "I am. "), entitled, perverse, jealous, arrogant, paranoid, throbbing horror at the middle of so many of us.

I had not heard [music](http://sonicanhedonic.tumblr.com/ "Sonic Anhedonic Recording Company") for it, until I heard this song.

This sarcastic spasm of a song for that part of humanity [which views altruism with the deepest suspicion](http://www.aynrand.org/site/PageServer?pagename=objectivism_essentials).  That pegs the kind, with curled lip, as martyrs. The modest, weak.

This song, that pitches about in awkward, whinging, [nauseous](https://www.facebook.com/vincentvocodervoice "Yeah, you know. ") guitar squall, terrifying blasts of weaponised fuzz-tone, the battle of super-ego, ego, and id.

This song, that ebbs into plangent gorgeousness, a warm, gooey centre that feels, if not like camaraderie, then companionship at least.

This song, with its heady tumbles of disquiet, of imagery for a porn-rotted people that have grown accustomed to 8,460,000,000 results in 0.22 seconds.

This song.

_This song._
